articles.title: LG Q61 launched: A Q60 replacement with a MediaTek chipset and 4 GB of RAM for about US$300 - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: LG has unveiled its latest device, the Q61. A follow-on from the LG Velvet, the Q61 appears to be a direct replacement for the Q60.
articles.content: LG has announced the Q61, its follow on from the Velvet. Launching on May 29 in South Korea, the Q61 is a moderate upgrade from the Q60 that LG released last year. The Q61 measures 164.5 x 77.5 x 8.3… [+1188 chars]
